## About Me
I am currently an MA candidate of Economics at the University of Chicago. I obtained his B.S. in both Economics and Mathematics from The Ohio State University in Spring 2019. My research interest is in public economics with current focus on the migration effect of Sanctuary City Policies.

I am a self-proclaimed magician, photographer, boardgame-maker, and funny T-shirt enthusiast.

Check out my newest revision of the game secret hitler called **[The Deomocratic Republicans](https://willythewoo.github.io/WillyTheWoo/The_Democratic_Republicans.pdf)**


For my photography work, [click here](https://www.flickr.com/photos/6149pix).
